learningPaths.details: The Beginner Learning Path provides an introductory journey through foundational concepts and skills for new learners in various fields.

The DevOps Engineer Path is tailored for IT professionals who wish to gain a comprehensive understanding of both development and operations, including coding, infrastructure management, system administration, and DevOps toolchains.
This Software Development Path offers ten in-depth courses covering key aspects of software design, development, and maintenance, aimed at preparing developers with the latest industry practices.
The QA Learning Path features five comprehensive courses focused on quality assurance and testing methodologies to ensure software reliability and effectiveness.
The UI/UX Learning Path consists of eight specialized courses that guide learners through the principles of user interface design and user experience optimization for effective digital products.
The Machine Learning Path contains seven courses designed to provide a foundation in artificial intelligence, data analysis, and data-driven decision-making, essential for future tech innovations.
The HR Learning Path includes three courses focused on modern human resources practices, personnel management, and strategic hiring techniques to build effective teams.
